大なたを振るう: (おおなたをふるう) - to make drastic cuts; to take an axe to
大なり: (ダイナリ) - greater-than mark (>); right angle bracket
大なり小なり: (だいなりしょうなり) - to a greater or lesser extent (degree); more or less
大の: (だいの) - large/big; grown (man, etc.); great (friend, etc.)/huge (football fan, etc.)
大のお気に入り: (だいのおきにいり) - most favorite thing
大の大人: (だいのおとな) - grown man; grown woman; grown-up person; sensible person
大の字: (だいのじ) - shape of the "dai" kanji (esp. person with arms and legs outstretched); sprawling; lying spread-eagled
大の月: (だいのつき) - long month (i.e. having 31 days)
大の猫好き: (だいのねこずき) - ardent cat lover (fancier)
大の苦手: (だいのにがて) - dread; horror; hatred
大の虫を生かして小の虫を殺す: (だいのむしをいかしてしょうのむしをころす) - (proverb) sacrifice something small in order to save something great; lose a leg to save one's life; to let a large bug live and kill a small one
大の虫を生かして小の虫を殺せ: (だいのむしをいかしてしょうのむしをころせ) - (proverb) sacrifice something small in order to save something great; lose a leg to save one's life; let a large bug live and kill a small one
大は小を兼ねる: (だいはしょうをかねる) - (proverb) the greater embraces the less; better too big than too small
大ぶり: (おおぶり) - somewhat large/of a larger size/on the large size; large swing (bat, racquet, etc.)/long sweeping stroke
大ぼらを吹く: (おおぼらをふく) - to talk through one's hat; to blow one's own horn
大まか: (おおまか) - rough (e.g. sketch, approximation)/broad/general/loose; generous/openhanded
大まかに言えば: (おおまかにいえば) - generally speaking
大みそか: (おおみそか) - New Year's Eve; December 31st
大もうけ: (おおもうけ) - large profit; a killing
大やけど: (おおやけど) - large burn or scald
大よそ: (おおよそ) - about/roughly/approximately; generally/on the whole/as a rule; completely/quite/entirely/altogether/totally/not at all (with neg. verb); outline/gist
大らか: (おおらか) - placid/composed/serene/calm; big hearted/broad-minded/magnanimous; great quantity (of something)
大わらわ: (おおわらわ) - strenuous efforts; hard fighting
大アナコンダ: (オオアナコンダ) - green anaconda (Eunectes murinus)
大アメリカ鼯鼠: (オオアメリカモモンガ) - northern flying squirrel (Glaucomys sabrinus)
大アルマジロ: (オオアルマジロ) - giant armadillo (Priodontes maximus)
大イチョウ: (おおイチョウ) - large ginkgo tree; {sumo} ginkgo-leaf top-knot worn by makuuchi and juryo division wrestlers
大カナダ藻: (オオカナダモ) - Brazilian elodea (species of aquatic plant, Egeria densa)
大ゴキブリ: (オオゴキブリ) - Panesthia spadica (species of cockroach)
大ジョッキ: (だいジョッキ) - large beer mug
大スズメバチ: (オオスズメバチ) - Asian giant hornet (Vespa mandarinia); yak-killer hornet
大ニュース: (だいニュース) - headline; momentous news
大ノリ: (おおノリ) - excitedly; type of rhythm for noh songs
大バカ: (おおバカ) - extreme foolishness; utter fool
大ヒット: (だいヒット) - big hit; popular item (e.g. movie, music)
大フラミンゴ: (オオフラミンゴ) - greater flamingo (Phoenicopterus roseus)
大フルマ鴎: (オオフルマカモメ) - giant petrel (esp. the southern giant petrel, Macronectes giganteus)
大ブリテン島: (だいブリテンとう) - Great Britain
大ボケ: (おおボケ) - great idiot; fool; (saying) something silly or stupid
大マゼラン雲: (だいマゼランうん) - Large Magellanic Cloud
大丈夫: (daijoubu) - seguro, protegido, íntegro, sem problemas, sem medo, tudo bem, certo, ok; certamente, com certeza, indubitavelmente, seguro, protegido, íntegro, sem problemas, sem medo, tudo bem, certo, ok; certamente, com certeza, indubitavelmente; não, obrigado, estou bem, tudo bem
大三元: (だいさんげん) - {mahj} big three dragons; winning hand consisting of pungs or kongs of each of the three types of dragon tiles
大上段: (だいじょうだん) - holding a sword above one's head (kendo posture); haughty attitude/overbearing manner
大上段に構える: (だいじょうだんにかまえる) - to hold a sword above one's head; to be haughty/to be arrogant
大不列顚: (グレートブリテン) - Great Britain
大不列顛: (グレートブリテン) - Great Britain
大不敬: (だいふけい) - great impropriety (esp. towards the imperial family); crime against the imperial family (or a shrine dedicated to them, etc.)
大不況: (だいふきょう) - major recession/serious (economical) depression; Great Depression
大中小: (だいちゅうしょう) - large, medium, or small (clothing size)
大主教: (だいしゅきょう) - archbishop (Orthodox, Anglican, etc.)
大乗り: (おおのり) - excitedly; type of rhythm for noh songs
大乗り気: (おおのりき) - good mood; excited mood
大乗仏教: (だいじょうぶっきょう) - Mahayana Buddhism
大事: (おおごと) - important; valuable; serious matter
大事に至る: (だいじにいたる) - to develop into a serious incident
大事の前の小事: (だいじのまえのしょうじ) - Lose a fly to catch a trout; small sacrifice in a great cause
大事をとる: (だいじをとる) - to take care doing something; to be prudent
大事を取る: (だいじをとる) - to take care doing something; to be prudent
大事件: (だいじけん) - (ant: 小事件) major incident; major event
大事故: (だいじこ) - serious accident; major incident
大事業: (だいじぎょう) - large enterprise; big business; large undertaking
大人: (たいじん) - man of substance or virtue/gentleman; giant; adult
大人かわいい: (おとなかわいい) - fashion style of adult women characterized by makeup and clothing that subtly emphasizes cuteness.
大人しく: (おとなしく) - meekly; obediently; submissively; quietly; like a lamb
大人しやか: (おとなしやか) - gentle; quiet; demure; sober; mild-mannered; meek
大人じみた: (おとなじみた) - precocious; unchildlike; early-blooming
大人のおもちゃ屋: (おとなのおもちゃや) - adult toy shop (i.e. a sex shop)
大人の事情: (おとなのじじょう) - pretext for not revealing something (e.g. actual reason for one's failure, vested interest, etc.)
大人の玩具屋: (おとなのおもちゃや) - adult toy shop (i.e. a sex shop)
大人は赤子の心を失わず: (たいじんはせきしのこころをうしなわず) - (proverb) (from Mencius) great human beings never lose the innocence of childhood; a virtuous ruler never loses the spirit of the common people
大人びる: (おとなびる) - to become grown-up; to age; to mature
大人ぶる: (おとなぶる) - to act like a grown up; to pretend to be an adult
大人可愛い: (おとなかわいい) - fashion style of adult women characterized by makeup and clothing that subtly emphasizes cuteness.
大人数: (おおにんず) - large number of people
大人物: (だいじんぶつ) - great or magnanimous man
